ROOT.QUERY: select ecdsite "Whs #", ecdcexcde "PO #", foucnuf || '' | '' || foulibl "Supplier code desc", ecdetat || '' | '' || pkparpostes.get_postlibl@heinens_custom_prod(1,10,502, ecdetat,''HN'') "Status", to_char(ecddcom,''MM/DD/RR'') "Order date", to_char(ecddliv,''MM/DD/RR'') "Expected delivery date", (select count(1) from cdedetcde@heinens_custom_prod where dcdcincde=ecdcincde and ecdsite=dcdsite and ecdcfin=dcdcfin) "Nb items", ''Allotment order not received'' "Comment" from cdeentcde@heinens_custom_prod, foudgene@heinens_custom_prod where not exists (select 1 from stoentre@heinens_custom_prod where sercincde=ecdcincde and sersite=ecdsite and sercfin=ecdcfin and serccin=ecdccin) and trunc(sysdate-1)= trunc(ecddliv) and ecdsite in (91072, 95073, 95074) and foucfin=ecdcfin and ecdtype=9 /* and trunc(ecddcom)>trunc(sysdate-30) */ and ecdetat in (5,6,7) union select ecdsite "Whs #", ecdcexcde "PO #", foucnuf || '' | '' || foulibl "Supplier code desc", ecdetat || '' | '' || pkparpostes.get_postlibl@heinens_custom_prod(1,10,502, ecdetat,''HN'') "Status", to_char(ecddcom,''MM/DD/RR'') "Order date", to_char(ecddliv,''MM/DD/RR'') "Expected delivery date", (select count(1) from cdedetcde@heinens_custom_prod where dcdcincde=ecdcincde and ecdsite=dcdsite and ecdcfin=dcdcfin) "Nb items", ''Closed without delivery'' "Comment" from cdeentcde@heinens_custom_prod, foudgene@heinens_custom_prod where not exists (select 1 from stoentre@heinens_custom_prod where sercincde=ecdcincde and sersite=ecdsite and sercfin=ecdcfin and serccin=ecdccin) and trunc(sysdate)>trunc(ecddliv) and ecdsite in (91072, 95073, 95074) and foucfin=ecdcfin and ecdtype=9 and trunc(ecddliv)>trunc(sysdate-14) */ and ecdetat=7 and ecdmotif=903
